means: 长曲棍球（两队各十名队员，用带网兜的球棒接球、带球和传球）

sentence.Network_en: In recent times the most striking exports have been in the vocabulary of lacrosse and hockey.
sentence.Network_cn: 在近代最突出的外来词是有关长曲棍球和曲棍球运动方面的词汇.

sentence.Network_en: There was trauma; I got hit in the head during a lacrosse game.
sentence.Network_cn: 我受过伤; 曲棍球比赛的时候,我的头被打中了.

sentence.Network_en: He sprinted away with the ball cradled in his lacrosse stick.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用球杆带着球全速跑开了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French (le jeu de) la crosse ('the game of) the hooked stick'. Compare with crosse

entry.tran: 兜网球，袋棍球，长曲棍球（用带网长棍接球和掷球的一种户外运动）
entry.def: Lacrosse is an outdoor game in which players use long sticks with nets at the end to catch and throw a small ball, in order to try and score goals.

means.word_mean: 1. a game invented by American indians; now played by two teams who use long-handled rackets to catch and carry and throw the ball toward the opponents' goal
